aircraft.value: Cyclops Vision - AC-5907-920 at Forward Operating Base-1

defect_observed.value: Autopilot disengagement without warning. Issue identified during pre-flight checks.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Radar System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Conduct non-destructive testing to verify structural integrity

preventive_action.value: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 16/09/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. T.R. Menon

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 18/09/2023 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational history analyzed. No abnormal usage patterns identified. Agree with proposed corrective actions. Date: 18/09/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 19/09/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 23/09/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar
